Headline: Northbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute near Howard/Ridge
ShortDescription: Northbound 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Howard, Ashland, and Rogers due to street blockage near Howard/Ridge.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Howard, Ashland, and Rogers due to street blockage near Howard/Ridge.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an mechanical problem on the train at Garfield. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an mechanical problem on the train at Garfield.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
